program: Master of Science in Materials Science (MS)

sections.text: Caltechâ€™s MS in Materials Science is typically awarded to doctoral students upon request once course requirements are met; admission is generally to the PhD program.

items: Materials Science core: MS 131, MS 132, MS 133 (27 units)
Thermodynamics: APh/MS/ME 105 abc (or approved alternatives) (27 units)
Up to 9 units of research (MS 200 or equivalent) may substitute for lecture/lab
sections.text: Study ordinarily requires at least three terms of courses chosen from approved core, thermodynamics, and elective lists; limited research units may count.

items: MS is generally conferred upon doctoral students who fulfill requirements; separate MS admission is rare
sections.text: Per catalog policy, the MS is typically awarded to students in the doctoral program after completing prescribed coursework.
